title: ollama/ollama
summary: The official Ollama CLI and server that lets you run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama/ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama server; works in Node, Deno, Bun and browsers.

title: ollama/ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; pip install ollama, sync & async APIs.

title: jmorganca/ollama
summary: PyPI landing page for the official ollama Python package (mirror of GitHub repo).

title: ollama/ollama-npm
summary: npm registry page for the official ollama JavaScript package.

title: langchain-ai/langchain (Ollama integration)
summary: LangChain’s built-in Ollama LLM and chat integrations; call local models inside chains.

title: ollama-webui/ollama-webui (now Open WebUI)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, file upload, RAG, user management).

title: ollama4j/ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; Maven Central artifact.

title: mxschmitt/ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama/ollama-main
summary: Official Docker image for the Ollama server (AMD64 & ARM64).

title: sgpublic/ollama-bin
summary: Community-maintained portable Ollama binaries for Windows & Linux CI.

title: ollama/ollama-hnsw
summary: Experimental HNSW vector-index plugin for Ollama embeddings.

title: ollama/ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes.

title: ollama/ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that lets you query local Ollama models from within notes.

title: ollama/ollama-vscode
summary: VS Code extension to chat with Ollama models inside the editor.

title: ollama/ollama-ray
summary: Ray Serve deployment example for scaling Ollama models across GPUs.

title: ollama/ollama-cdktf
summary: CDKTF (Terraform) constructs to provision Ollama on AWS EC2 with GPU.

title: ollama/ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module for CI pipelines that build and test against Ollama containers.

title: ollama/ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example using Ollama embeddings + Chroma + LangChain.

title: ollama/ollama-functions
summary: Prototype server that adds OpenAI-style function-calling on top of Ollama chat.
